name: Freakaversity
description:
Welcome to Freakaversity, one of the oldest and most prestigious universities in the country. You're not really sure how you got in, considering every other student is a monster, but hey- why not make the most of it? Make new friends, clash with foes, and try to make this year's Oktoberfest one to remember as you explore the castle and adjust to your new life as a student here.

Meet some of the interesting characters that will be studying with you at Freakaversity;

Phoebe - An incredibly enthusiastic, one-eyed cutie! She even volunteered to be your roommate to make sure you get the best college experience here at Freakiversity.

Bayley - Although he's a werewolf, you've got nothing to fear when he's around. He's always ready to make new friends, and as the soccer team's superstar, he's very easy to get along with.

Siegfried Krolin - An old fashioned vampire who is NOT thrilled by your admission to Freakaversity- don't get on his bad side!

Bee & Gee - These zombie twins have been friends with Siegfried for a long time. They're both pretty laid back, and just wanna have a good time.

After getting in a fight, the Principal tasks you and your adversary with completing the Oktoberfest celebrations. You'll have three main quests to complete;

  • Fix the garden
  • Get some booze
  • Something Siegfried wants to do…
